information: Pangea Brokers was stablished in 2017 by professionals with a large experience in nuts and dried fruits. It´s a company specialized in the trade of organic and conventional Nuts, Dried Fruits, Spices and Seeds. Our main products are cashews, pistachios, walnuts, hazelnut, peanuts, almonds, pumpkin seeds, desiccated coconut, raisins, dried apricots and pepper from different origins. We work directly with farmers and suppliers all around the world to provide information in real time to our clients and obtaining the best relation quality-price. At the same time, we offer a totally customized treatment to suppliers and clients.
